start: ^You approach a book shelf and notice a book entitled 'Stress Busters!'.
stress_info: ^There are things called stress busters that can help you relax and destress.
^One of them is healthy food. Healthy food according to the Lusog-Isip Kabataan Education program can help reduce stress.
^Exercise is also another great stress buster! Exercising not only reduces stress, but also can improve your health!
end: ^You close the book and walk away
